abstract: In a Q&A with The New York Times’s Adam Bryant, Lloyd C. Blankfein, chief executive of Goldman Sachs, discusses his the financial crisis, his management style, and the leadership lessons he’s learned during his time on Wall Street.
snippet: In a Q&A with The New York Times’s Adam Bryant, Lloyd C. Blankfein, chief executive of Goldman Sachs, discusses his the financial crisis, his management style, and the leadership lessons he’s learned during his time on Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: The following is an interview with Lloyd C. Blankfein, chief executive of Goldman Sachs, conducted, condensed and edited by Adam Bryant:
